meanings.sent2: Oh durn, I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent3: Durn, I missed the bus again!
meanings.sent4: The durn rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: Durn it, why does this always happen to me?

meanings.definition: A mild expletive used to express frustration or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: She let out a durn when she realized she lost her keys.
meanings.sent2: The child's constant durns were starting to annoy the teacher.
meanings.sent3: After stubbing his toe, he couldn't help but yell a durn.
meanings.sent4: The durns from the neighboring apartment kept him up all night.
meanings.sent5: The durn of the car engine signaled another breakdown.
